data.event: 10)pandavra bande(pandavas lived few days here) 11)Sidhdhalingappana Betta 12)Naga Basappa & Gavi Siddappa 13)Sharabhalingeshwara temple in Sagar and more places in city.. Shahapur is famous for Chara Basaveshwara Temple, which is surrounded by hills in all directions.

event.title: is celebrated every year in April

data.event: Its annual function called "Jatre" is celebrated every year in April.
